author: Quint Forgey
title: Biden urges sanctions relief for Iran amid coronavirus
description: “In times of global crisis, America should lead,” the Democratic presidential candidate said in a statement.
content:
While Biden acknowledged that the leadership in Tehran failed to respond effectively to this crisis and continues to act provocatively in the region, he noted that the Iranian people are hurting desperately.
Biden also repeated his criticism of President Don… [+2805 chars]
